channel.title: Drop help PI?
channel.description: I am using a PI source i want to make something drop 300k per kill ID 158, how do i do that?

item.title: Drop help PI?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“bobmich, post:5, topic:391479”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=487489.msg3572174#msg3572174 date=1303139246]

npcdrops.tsm tends to most pi’s drops.

What i do because if i do
995:1 that means it will drop 1 coint every time?
do i do 995:300000:1
?
[/quote]no do itemid:amountofitem

nope i did 158:1 995:300000
No drop[/quote]

try 158:20 tab 995:itemamount

Read full topic
